title: Product Inventory
description:
Create an Inventory class with:
- HashMap<String, Integer> field named stock (product → quantity)
- Constructor that initializes stock
- addProduct(String product, int quantity) method
- getStock(String product) method returning quantity (or 0 if not found)
- hasProduct(String product) method returning boolean
instructions:

hints.text: Define a function using the java syntax. Don't forget the return statement if needed.
Use an if statement to check the condition.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to java code.
